title: SPRING SPECIAL
short_desc: Let spring shopping begin with a $50 Amex Card. The Evelyn has a prime shopping location near Fashion Avenue and Macy’s flagship 34th Street store. Create memories with this $50 card
long_desc:
Get a spring in your step with some extra spending money! 

Our Spring Special grants Evelyn Members a $50 AmEx Card when you book directly with us. The Evelyn is in the heart of NoMad, just blocks away from Fashion Avenue and Macy's flagship 34th Street location, the largest department store in the world. Shop brands you've only seen in the movies. Who knows? You might even spot a celeb during your stay.

Three-night stay minimum.

We hope our members-only gift helps you get out and experience more of the city this spring! Reserve online or call (212) 545-8000 to access this Members Only offer at The Evelyn.
